TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParentControlDesigner extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展支持嵌套控件的 的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a that supports nested controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面向设计人员可以包含子控件的控件提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of controls that can contain child controls. 除了方法和功能从继承并类，使子控件添加到中，从删除、 选择和排列控件在设计它所扩展的行为中时间。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the and classes, enables child controls to be added to, removed from, selected within, and arranged within the control whose behavior it extends at design time. 可以将设计器关联的类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现一个自定义。The following example demonstrates how to implement a custom . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void CreateTool(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem tool) cil managed

param.name: tool
param.span: 要从中创建组件的 。

span.span: The to create a component from.

summary.span: 从指定工具创建一个组件或控件并将其添加到当前的设计文档。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新组件或控件位于当前所选控件的中心。The new component or control is positioned at the center of the currently selected control. 此方法使用的默认大小工具，如果该工具有指定的默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool, if the tool has a default size specified. 若要指定位置或位置和大小的组件或控件，请使用其他重载之一方法。To specify a location or location and size for the component or control, use one of the other overloaded methods.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 从指定工具创建组件或控件，并将其添至当前设计文档中的指定位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新组件或控件位于指定的位置附近`location`参数。The new component or control is positioned around the location specified by the `location` parameter. 如果组件的默认大小，此方法使用该工具的组件的默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool's component, if the component has a default size. 若要指定位置和大小的组件或控件，使用适当的重载方法。To specify a location and size for the component or control, use the appropriate overloaded method.

summary.span: 获取已添至设计器的控件的默认位置。

value.span: ，指示已添至设计器的控件的默认位置。

span.span: A that indicates the default location for a control added to the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置通常是 (0，0)。The default location is usually (0,0). 如果容器具有特殊的边框，或由于其他原因，通常被更改的默认位置。The default location is typically changed if the container has special borders, or for other reasons.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置网格的各个方格的大小，该网格在设计器处于网格绘制模式时绘制。

summary.span: 在将拖放对象放置到控件设计器视图上时调用。

span.span: Called when a drag-and-drop object is dropped onto the control designer view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查的拖放处理程序可以改为处理操作任何父控件。This method checks any parent control for a drag-and-drop handler that can handle the operation instead. 如果存在，此方法将传递到方法，并返回。If one exists, this method passes the to the method and returns. 如果没有父拖放处理程序存在，此方法会尝试创建一个工具，如果已将工具箱项删除设计器控件上。If no parent drag-and-drop handler exists, this method attempts to create a tool if a toolbox item has been dropped on the designer control.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

protected: override void OnMouseDragBegin(int x, int y);

param.name: x
param.span: 屏幕坐标中鼠标的 x 坐标。

param.name: y

summary.span: 调用以响应在组件上时按下鼠标左键并按住不放这一操作。

span.span: Called in response to the left mouse button being pressed and held while over the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用以响应在组件上按下鼠标左键。This method is called in response to the left mouse button being pressed on a component. 在设计器将重写此方法以提供用于在控件内的组件的"套索"选择机制的基本窗体。The designer overrides the base form of this method to provide a "lasso" selection mechanism for components within the control. > [!NOTE] > 可以传递到屏幕坐标点方法的类来获取该控件相对于左上角的点的坐标。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSetCursor() cil managed

summary.span: 提供更改当前鼠标光标的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to change the current mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置鼠标光标根据以下规则： 如果工具箱服务具有工具处于选中状态，它允许工具箱服务来设置光标。This method sets the mouse cursor according to the following rules: If the toolbox service has a tool selected, it allows the toolbox service to set the cursor. 否则，将鼠标光标设置为默认的鼠标光标。Otherwise, the mouse cursor is set to the default mouse cursor.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这接口方法重写将一组属性添加到此设计器的控件，允许用户设置到的网格显示和子控件对齐方式相关的选项。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's control that allow a user to set options related to the grid display and child control alignment. 此方法将添加以下可浏览属性： `DrawGrid`， `SnapToGrid`，和`GridSize`。This method adds the following browsable properties: `DrawGrid`, `SnapToGrid`, and `GridSize`.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support
